body:
Spack appears to alphabetically sort variants when it displays them in a `spack info` command. I don't think it should. Or, maybe sorting should be default but have an option to disable it and then list in the order they are defined in the package. Why? When variants are related to each other and/or there are many variants, its better for them to appear next to each other in the `spack info` command. I've added a number of variants to MFEM (coming in a new pull request), and here's what I get...

```
Variants:
    Name [Default]        Allowed values    Description


    debug [off]           True, False       Build debug version

    hypre [off]           True, False       Required for MPI parallel features

    lapack [off]          True, False       Use external blas/lapack routines

    mesquite [off]        True, False       Enable MESQUITE mesh quality
                                            features

    metis [off]           True, False       Required for MPI parallel features

    mpfr [off]            True, False       Enable multi-precision floating
                                            point features

    mpi [on]              True, False       Enable MPI parallel features

    netcdf [off]          True, False       Enable Cubit/Genesis reader

    openmp [off]          True, False       Enable OpenMP parallel features

    petsc [off]           True, False       Enable PETSc solvers,
                                            preconditioners, etc..

    suite-sparse [off]    True, False       Enable serial, sparse direct solver
                                            features

    sundails [off]        True, False       Enable Sundials time integrators

    superlu-dist [off]    True, False       Enable parallel, sparse direct
                                            solver features

    threadsafe [off]      True, False       Enable thread safe features.
                                            Required for OpenMP.

```
title: Option to disable sorting of variants in `spack info ...`
